events.description: Lithium carbonate futures fell to CNY 145,000 per tonne from a high of CNY 180,000.
Chinese authorities lowered export rebates for battery producers effective from April.
Beijing announced a plan to double EV charging capacity to 180 gigawatts by 2027.
Cancellation of 27 mining permits in the Jiangxi lithium hub.

facts.fact_text: Lithium carbonate futures sank to CNY 145,000 per tonne.

evidences.evidence_text: Lithium carbonate futures sank to CNY 145,000 per tonne

facts.fact_text: Chinese authorities lowered export rebates for battery producers from April.

evidences.evidence_text: Chinese authorities lowered export rebates for battery producers from April

facts.fact_text: Beijing stated it would double EV charging capacity to 180 gigawatts by 2027.

evidences.evidence_text: Beijing stating it would double EV charging capacity to 180 gigawatts by 2027

facts.fact_text: 27 mining permits were canceled in the lithium hub of Jiangxi.

evidences.evidence_text: authorities stated 27 mining permits were canceled in the lithium hub of Jiangxi

facts.fact_text: Activity in CATL's Jianxiawo lithium mine was suspended.

evidences.evidence_text: earlier suspension of activity in CATL's Jianxiawo lithium mine

claims.claim_text: Markets reconsidered the demand from power storage investments in major economies.

evidences.evidence_text: markets reconsidered the demand from power storage investments in major economies

claims.claim_text: Lowered export rebates drove manufacturers to front-run lithium orders.

evidences.evidence_text: lowered export rebates for battery producers from April, driving manufacturers to front-run lithium orders

claims.claim_text: Infrastructure bets and higher power storage spending support the outlook for lithium and other battery metals.

evidences.evidence_text: ambitious bets in power and datacenter infrastructure... combined with the announcement of higher power storage spending, supporting the outlook for lithium and other battery metals

claims.claim_text: Doubling EV charging capacity supports lithium-rich energy storage systems.

evidences.evidence_text: double EV charging capacity to 180 gigawatts by 2027, supporting lithium-rich energy storage systems

evidence.evidence_text: tracking the aggressive pullback in speculative metals as markets reconsidered the demand
lowered export rebates for battery producers from April, driving manufacturers to front-run lithium orders
double EV charging capacity to 180 gigawatts by 2027, supporting lithium-rich energy storage systems
suspension of activity in CATL's Jianxiawo lithium mine amid Beijing's anti-involution campaign
